Suddenly, Grandpa’s grinning face appears above you.

Inside you find many curiosities. Among them potions and herbs. You purchase a book and some herbs in order to cast a spell to get your family to like you better.

The store owner warns against messing with the black arts but you don’t listen and are rude to him. He knows this is going to turn out badly but for your rudeness agrees to the purchase to teach you a lesson.
